title: World Game Universe - Novel Updates
author: Mayhard205
description: The year 2025 is a period in which the popularity of a game made by Energy Corporation exploded in various parts of the world. This game is called Universe. Do not miss Indonesia where this country is the distributor country of the game. A normal college kid who was born poor trying his luck in gameplay and determined to be the best. Can he face all the Problem in the gaming world as well as the real world?>
